title: Davos 2015: World Economic Forum Preview
teaser: Bloomberg editor Tom Keene says recent developments in Europe make it a particularly exciting event.
contentencoded:
The 45th annual meeting of the World Economic Forum kicks off in Davos, Switzerland, tomorrow. Thousands of delegates from more than 100 countries are descending on the ski resort to spend four days discussing money and politics.

Bloomberg editor Tom Keene joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to preview the meeting. Keene says recent developments in Europe make it a particularly exciting event.

Guest

  • Tom Keene, editor-at-large for Bloomberg News and host of “Bloomberg Surveillance” on Bloomberg Radio and Bloomberg Television. He tweets @tomkeene.
